channel.title: Anyone willing to help me with chords?
channel.description:
I love big future bass chords a lot especially when they are full of emotion, and interest.
If anyone is open to it, I would love some help being able to make these types of chordsüòä
Just pm me if your open, thanks so muchüëç

item.title: Anyone willing to help me with chords?
item.dc:creator: TheRealJFalc
item.description:
Then it really hinges on just practicing and knowing what sort of chords work for you, for the song, for the style, etc.

If you need to go basic and do the classic I V vi IV progression, nobody will fault you. It‚Äôs been done many times. But that‚Äôs because it works.

https://www.youtube.com/embed/oOlDewpCfZQ

So my suggestion is to find what works for you and go from there.

Read full topic
